alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 1:05PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at Abbeville affecting Telfair, Dodge and Wilcox Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Juliette, Griffin, Juliette, Dames Ferry, Macon, Macon, Clinchfield, Hawkinsville, Byron, Hawkinsville, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at Abbeville. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Minor flooding of lowlands adjacent to the river continue to expand into the flood plain. Flooding of the nearby park and parking lot at the Abbeville boat ramp also expands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 13.3 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
